title: Does Europe need a spaceplane?
summary:

Philippe Koffi, French armament agency DGA strategic lead for air, land and naval combat. “A spaceplane is maneuverable, reusable and flexible, so it can deliver payload in orbit, recover critical assets, conduct reconnaissance and intervene against threats in orbit,” Koffi said […]

summary:

title: NASA, Northrop Grumman postpone Cygnus XL arrival to ISS following propulsion issue
summary: The spacecraft was originally scheduled to dock with the International Space Station the morning of Wednesday, Sept. 17. An alternate plan is in the works.

title: Project Kuiper plots broadband services in five countries by end of March
summary:
